mapper.update:
update IPO_A_BREED
BREEDID = #{record.breedid,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
BREEDNAME = #{record.breedname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SORTID = #{record.sortid,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
CONTRACTFACTOR = #{record.contractfactor,jdbcType=DECIMAL},

update IPO_A_BREED set BREEDID = #{record.breedid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, BREEDNAME = #{record.breedname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SORTID = #{record.sortid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, CONTRACTFACTOR = #{record.contractfactor,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, MINPRICEMOVE = #{record.minpricemove,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, SPREADALGR = #{record.spreadalgr,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, SPREADUPLMT = #{record.spreaduplmt,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, SPREADDOWNLMT = #{record.spreaddownlmt,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, MINQUANTITYMOVE = #{record.minquantitymove,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, CONTRACTFACTORNAME = #{record.contractfactorname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TRADETIME = #{record.tradetime,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, MINAPPLYNUM = #{record.minapplynum,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, MAXAPPLYNUM = #{record.maxapplynum,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, MINAPPLYQUAMOVE = #{record.minapplyquamove,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, PUBLISHALGR = #{record.publishalgr,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, DEALERPUBCHARATIO = #{record.dealerpubcharatio,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, MKTDEAPUBCHARATIO = #{record.mktdeapubcharatio,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, PUBLISHERCHARATIO = #{record.publishercharatio,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, MKTPUBCHARATIO = #{record.mktpubcharatio,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, CONTRACTCURRENCY = #{record.contractcurrency,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, TRADEDAYS = #{record.tradedays,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
mapper.select: select from (select t.*,rownum TNO from IPO_A_BREED t) a where a.TNO between #{beginnum} and #{endnum}
select from (select t.*,rownum TNO from IPO_A_BREED t where BREEDNAME like #{breedname}) a where a.TNO between #{beginnum} and #{endnum}
select count(*) from IPO_A_BREED where BREEDNAME like #{breedname}
